source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Dealing with changes in Human Resource Management

visible_instructors.name: Sana
visible_instructors.title: Sana Nazir
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor in the field of Business Administration

items.headline: Learn to cope up with transitions in HRM in today's environment
objectives_summary: Human Resource Management is a continuously changing field and students in this course will learn the basics of HRM and all factors that bring the change.
Be able to identify ways to cope up with the changes
Analyse the current scenarios and evaluate the projected scales of changes and focus on what actually is necessary for an organization to run effectively in order to meet its goals

items.title: Practice Tests for SHRM-CP and SHRM-SCP Exam Questions(2021)

visible_instructors.name: Angelo
visible_instructors.title: Angelo Gonsalves SHRM, PMP, CIPD
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor

items.headline: 320 Practice Questions to prepare you to pass the Human Resource Certification Exam, SHRM-CS SHRM SCP
objectives_summary: How to perfect your test taking skills by reviewing the tests and detailed answer explanations.
Improve your judgment, application and decision-making skills by using the scenario-based situational questions.
Enhance your knowledge and understanding of HR knowledge by using HR knowledge-based items

items.title: How to Conduct Effective Performance Evaluations

visible_instructors.name: Donna
visible_instructors.title: Donna Galatas
visible_instructors.job_title: HR Vice Empress / CEO of The Galatas Group

items.headline: A Step By Step Guide
objectives_summary: Achieve successful performance evaluations
Understand the various components of performance evaluations
Efficiently gather the information needed to assess work performance and easily write the formal evaluation

items.title: Appreciative Inquiry (AI) in Practice

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores the practice of Appreciative Inquiry (AI) as a collaborative and constructive inquiry process.
objectives_summary: Discover Appreciative Inquiry (AI) and its links to a strength-based approach to human development and organizational change.
Identify the power of positive questioning and story-telling as effective ways to engage stakeholders in change efforts.
Explore the Appreciative Inquiry (AI) change method in the form of the 4-D cycle.

items.title: How to Pull Off Major Organization Development (OD) changes

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses how OD interventions support organizational change by utilizing people resource.
objectives_summary: Identify the different levels within the organization that an Organization Development (OD) intervention can be deployed.
Explore an Intervention model for Harnessing the Human Resource.
Discover the OD intervention tool kit to create a safe environment where ideation, creativity and innovation are utilized to overcome challenges and pursue opportunities.

Discover the elements that go into creating a successful company culture.
Explore ways to create and/or enhance their company culture.
